title: Women Celebrating in a Vintage Kitchen Setting
description: Two women are smiling and celebrating in a kitchen. One woman is holding a drink in a tall glass, and the other is holding a bottle of liquor. Both are dressed in vintage-style attire, with one in a black dress and the other in a polka dot dress with a red belt and floral accessory. The kitchen has white cabinets and a blue backsplash. Streamers hang decoratively across the room, and there are bottles and glasses on the countertop.
